text: Kanye West and Kim Kardashian said "I do" at the Forte di Belvedere in Florence, Italy, May 24, 2014. E! News published the first photos of the happy couple. E! News Newlyweds Kanye West and Kim Kardashian walk down the aisle as friends and family look on at the Forte di Belvedere in Florence, Italy, May 24, 2014. E! News published the first photos of the happy couple. E! News Kim Kardashian had one last fitting of her Givenchy Haute Couture lace gown at the Givenchy atelier in Paris before the wedding ceremony. E! News published the first photos of the happy couple. E! News Kanye West and Kim Kardashian kiss shortly after their nuptials took place at Forte di Belvedere in Florence, Italy, May 24, 2014. E! News published the first photos of the happy couple. E! News Kanye West and Kim Kardashian wear matching jackets shortly after their nuptials took place at Forte di Belvedere in Florence, Italy, May 24, 2014. E! News published the first photos of the happy couple. E! News Giancarlo Giammetti posted this photo to his Instagram, May 24, 2014, from Kim Kardashian and Kanye West's party the night before their wedding at Versailles' Hall of Mirrors where Lana Del Rey performed. Giancarlo Giammetti/Instagram Giancarlo Giammetti posted this photo to his Instagram, May 23, 2014: "Here are the most lovely couple." Giancarlo Giammetti/Instagram Kim Kardashian and Kanye West leave their residence in Paris, May 23, 2014, ahead of their wedding. Marc Piasecki/Getty Images Kris Jenner and Bruce Jenner seen leaving the Four Seasons George V Hotel, May 22, 2014 in Paris. Neil P.
